name: Gerridae
description: The Gerridae is a large fey creature known for its aquatic nature, having a robust physique with notable strength and resilience. It has a distinct appearance suited to its environment and is often found with a saddle, ready for a rider.
memorable: Its ability to walk on water and resistance to charm while ridden makes it a unique companion.
goals: Typically serves as a mount for aquatic riders, navigating over water surfaces while remaining resilient.
relations: May be found alongside other aquatic fey or as mounts for adventurers.
environment: Typically found in water bodies or areas close to water, as it suffers while on dry land.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution make it effective in combat, and its Water Walker ability allows for unique movement over water.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to damage from prolonged exposure to dry land, losing hit points over time.
attacks: Makes one Bite attack dealing piercing damage and one Claw attack dealing slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Water Walker allows it to traverse water as if it were solid ground, facilitating movement and tactical advantages.
additional_information: Can't be charmed or frightened with a rider.
Loses hit points on dry land.
Good melee combatant with multiattack actions.
test_queries: large fey that can walk on water
strong creature that loses health on dry land
